Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Microcin S (MccS, Gly-rich; natural AMPs; antimicrobial protein; class 2a microcin, bacteriocin, Gram-negative bacteria, prokaryotes)
Sequence Information.Source: Escherichia coliG3/10;  human microbiota:gut, symbiont bacteria

Literature Information.Literature: The largest microcin reported so far.Activity: Expression of this peptide in a plasma-transformed E. coli inhibited its growth. Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Zschuttig A, Zimmermann K, Blom J, Goesmann A, Pohlmann C, Gunzer F.2012, Germany, Europe
Literature Information.Title: Identification and characterization of microcin S, a new antibacterial peptide produced by probiotic Escherichia coli G3/10.
